lines: Greetings and welcome to the Missing Member! No, really, all people are welcome to dine here! There is absolutely no danger of dismemberment!
Oh, hello there, Forename. Thank you for coming by, but I'm afraid I have nothing new to report. As ever, that bastard H'mhasi Tia's bein' a right pain in the arse.
Ack, there I go again with my cussing. Pray forgive me my poor manners─it ill becomes a waitress, I know.

Forename, ye've got to 'ear this! Since 'e lost to ye an' left on 'is journey, H'mhasi Tia 'asn't sent me a single letter! Not a bloody one! <sigh> Even when 'e's not around, 'e manages to piss me off...
In other news, I've begun helping out in the kitchen. It seemed to be the most natural thing to do. Just you watch, Forename─next, it'll be me as 'umbles that cocksure whoreson!
Hello there, Forename! I trust things are well with you. They couldn't be better with me and my little kitty. He is just the sweetest thing!
...Hm? H'mhasi who? I'm sure I've no idea who that worthless piece o' turd is.

obj.n: 素材にこだわるレシピ
ヴァレンティオンエプロンドレス
ホーリーレインボーボトム
